title: pOTravum pugazh mAlai
sahitya:
pOTravum pugazh mAlai sATri magizhavum EtravArenakku AtraruL murugA


anupallavi

  Utrup-punal pOL enadu uLLattil Urum bhakti Atru nIranaiya ODi aDi unadaivaruDa


caraNam    kunru pala mIdu senru ninru koNDa shemmalai kunrakkuDi tannil kuDi koNDa vaLLalai
cennimalai mEviDum sEvarkkoDi selvanai cennaik-kandak-kOTTa manram vITra mannanai
